name: Oscar Piastri
description: Australian driver for McLaren, known for his impressive rookie season and strong qualifying performances.

name: Lando Norris
description: British driver for McLaren, known for his consistent podium finishes and engaging personality.

name: George Russell
description: British driver for Mercedes, known for his strong qualifying performances and race craft.

name: Kimi Antonelli
description: Italian junior driver for Mercedes, highly regarded in the junior categories.

name: Charles Leclerc
description: Monegasque driver for Ferrari, team leader with multiple race wins and pole positions.

name: Lewis Hamilton
description: Seven-time World Champion joining Ferrari, known as one of the greatest drivers in F1 history.

name: Max Verstappen
description: Three-time World Champion for Red Bull, known for his dominant performances and racing aggression.

name: Yuki Tsunoda
description: Japanese driver for Red Bull Racing, known for his aggressive driving style and improving consistency.

name: Alexander Albon
description: Thai-British driver for Williams, known for strong race performances and overtaking ability.

name: Carlos Sainz
description: Spanish driver for Williams, race winner known for his consistent performances and race craft.

name: Liam Lawson
description: New Zealand driver for Racing Bulls, impressed in his substitute appearances with strong performances.

name: Isack Hadjar
description: French junior driver for Racing Bulls, competing in Formula 2 with Red Bull backing.

name: Lance Stroll
description: Canadian driver for Aston Martin, known for strong wet weather performances and qualifying pace.

name: Fernando Alonso
description: Two-time World Champion for Aston Martin, known for his exceptional racecraft and experience.

name: Nico Hulkenberg
description: Experienced German driver for Kick Sauber, known for strong qualifying performances and consistency.

name: Gabriel Bortoleto
description: Brazilian junior driver for Kick Sauber, Formula 3 champion developing in the junior categories.

name: Esteban Ocon
description: French driver for Haas, Grand Prix winner known for his racecraft and determined driving style.

name: Oliver Bearman
description: British junior driver for Haas, impressed in his F1 debut and competing in Formula 2.

name: Pierre Gasly
description: French driver for Alpine, Grand Prix winner known for his determined driving style and experience.

name: Franco Colapinto
description: Argentine junior driver for Alpine, competing in Formula 2 and part of Alpine's junior program.
